=== When patch needs work ===
<pre>
Thank you for your work on this patch.  On review of the patch, we feel this patch can be improved further <Guidance on how to improve>.  As per the policy of the Ubuntu Review Team, I'm tagging this patch as 'patch-needswork', please feel free to change the tag to 'patch' when you have a patch ready to be integrated into upstream and/or Ubuntu.
</pre>

=== Forward patch upstream ===
<pre>
Thank you for your work on this patch.  Could you please forward the patch upstream to hear their take on this patch.  Please link the upstream bug here so we can check the status of the patch and follow up.  After you have forwarded the patch upstream, please feel free to change the 'patch' tag to 'patch-forwarded-upstream'
</pre>
